snippet: During the extended Fourth of July weekend, Chicago experienced 47 separate shootings that killed 11 and injured dozens.
abstract: Gunshots from 47 separate shootings echo through Chicago over extended Fourth of July weekend, killing 11 and wounding dozens more, including 5-year-old boy; events are sober reminder to residents that despite drop in homicides in 2013, gaining control over gun violence will be a long road, and political pressure on Mayor Rahm Emanuel’s first term is far from over.
lead_paragraph: During the extended Fourth of July weekend, Chicago experienced 47 separate shootings that killed 11 and injured dozens.

headline.main: A Violent Weekend in Chicago Despite a Recent Trend of Decreasing Homicides
headline.print_headline: A Violent Weekend in Chicago Despite a Recent Trend of Decreasing Homicides
